ocean.question: I wave and crash, but have no hands. Boats sail on me to reach new lands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 Fish swim in me.
🚢 I am very big and blue.
🏖️ You might see me at the beach.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slow. I carry my home wherever I go. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I leave a slimy trail.
🥬 I might eat plants.
🏡 I have a spiral on my back.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and can squirt ink. I live in the ocean, what do you think?

hints.text: 🐙 I'm a clever invertebrate.
🪨 I can hide in rocky places.
🎨 I use ink to get away.

ocean.question: I'm a large mammal that lives in the sea. I sing songs, can you guess who I can be?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very big.
💨 I breathe through a blowhole.
🎵 Some call me a gentle giant.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish with a funny name. People love to watch me, it's my fame. I hide in anemones, who am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have stripes like a tiger.
🏠 I live with a stinging plant.
🎬 I was in a popular movie.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. I scuttle sideways, without any pause. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I live on the beach and in the sea.
🚶 I walk in a funny way.
🦞 Some people like to eat me.

ocean.question: I'm a very large and flat fish. I can sting with my tail, if you make me swish. What am I?

hints.text: 🥏 I'm shaped like a disc.
⚠️ Be careful of my stinger.
🌊 I glide through the water.

ocean.question: I am a place deep under the sea, where no sunlight can reach, can you guess what am I?

hints.text: 🌑It is complete darkness
🔦Creatures here make their own light
🌊 It's the deepest part of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a predator with many teeth and a need for speed, I am known to patrol the seas. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have a fin on my back.
🦷 My teeth are very sharp.
🌊 Some types are very big and scary.

ocean.question: I'm a huge system of underwater life, built by tiny creatures. I'm home to many fish, what am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm made of coral.
🌈 I'm very colorful.
🤿 People like to visit me to snorkel and dive.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town. I stop to pick them up. What am I?

hints.text: 🚏 I have a specific place where I stop.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can ride me at the same time.
🎫 You usually need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across oceans. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am very big and can carry lots of cargo.
⚓ I use an anchor to stay in one place.
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings.
✈️ I take off from an airport.
🌍 I can travel across countries.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you have to pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🪑 I usually have a seat for one person.
🚲 You might wear a helmet when riding me.
🚦 I can be ridden on roads and paths.

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry lots of people and things across the land. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a specific route on rails.
📣 I make a loud sound when I approach.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 I can have many carriages joined together.

transport.question: I'm a car for emergencies and make a loud siren sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have flashing lights.
🚑 I help people who are sick or injured.
🏥 I often take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I travel underwater, and some are used by the military. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I can be very small or very large.
🔎 I can explore the bottom of the ocean.
⚓ I don't need to come up for air for a long time.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am smaller than a plane.
🚑 I can be used to rescue people.
🚦 I don't need a runway to take off.

transport.question: I am a type of transport that is pulled by horses and was common in the past. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I have wheels and carry people.
📜 You might see me in an old movie.
🌳 I don't need any gasoline.

transport.question: I travel to outer space and can be used to explore other planets. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast!
🪐 I can carry astronauts.
🌌 I leave Earth's atmosphere.
